comment: I took WELL1000 before it was no longer required for KSU. I had a lot of questions going into the course, so I would email her. She would not respond for days, and it seemed like she had no idea what I was talking about, which made communication in this class horrible. Extra credit at the end is very misleading.
rating_tags: Lots of homework--Get ready to read--Lecture heavy

comment: She not a good professor. The course itself wasn't hard, I would recommend taking this online, just pick a different instructor. She is not great about communication. The reason I got a B is because Bearface did not notify me that one of my assignments did not send. She was very rude when I asked about it, then just stopped replying to my emails.

Alooootttt of homework for an online wellness class. Everything is through the software BearFace. If you have a hard time managing your time, this might not be a class for you. Often preaches about no exceptions on late work in her emails and syllabus but made exceptions throughout the semester.
rating_tags: Get ready to read--LOTS OF HOMEWORK--Clear grading criteria

comment: Horrible Professor! Avoid if possible. The reviews on here are not lies. Take HPS on campus. Online class is ridiculous!
One of the worst teachers I have ever had. Not clear on assignments and due dates  for the class, and clarity is essential to an online class.  NEVER take her unless it is a last resort.

God bless her... she is just so dumb. i honestly want to know what goes through her mind when she's grading things and answering emails. she asked ME to answer questions about what she's supposed to do... like what

I thought this class was a lot of work, but if you take the quizzes and do the labs you should be good! You get two weeks to complete a section and with most of the quizzes you got two chances. Very easy.

If you take notes on each chapter you should be perfect, keep all your receipts from assignments! She may miss one. She is a little unorganized but in the end she seemed to tend to every bodies needs you just have to be on top of your own grades! YOU CAN RETAKE TEST, it's the same tests and answers so take notes on the answers and you'll get an A++

Teacher is simply horrible!!! Did everything she required and ended up gettin a D out the class because she doesn't clarify assignments..alot were closed when they were due,emailing back wasn't her priority! Will never catch me in her class again. She is so unorganized

I was heavily disappointed not by the course's content, but by the professor. Many of my classmates were frustrated with her and one of them even went to the department head to complain. It was THAT bad. The class is easy if you're into fitness, just don't expect much from the prof.
